welcome:
Welcome to Marchitect!

We help you create Minecraft mod-packs with ease.
Use "help" to see all the available commands and their options.

Some defaults: mod_loader = forge, game_version = 1.12.2

error_codes.1:
You haven't added any mods yet!

Type help to know more.
error_codes.2:
The command you have entered does not follow the allowed format!

Type help to know more.
error_codes.3:
Index out of range!

Type help to know more.
error_codes.4:
You haven't searched any mods yet!

Type help to know more.
error_codes.5:
The specified directory does not exist!

Type help to know more.
error_codes.6:
The specified file does not exist!

Type help to know more.

set.desc:
Sets the mod-pack options.
Available options = mod_loader(forge, fabric), game_version.
Note: Snapshots as game version not supported.

search.desc: Searches a mod with its name and views all the available options.

add.desc: Adds the mod to your mod list from your searched mods by its index.

list.desc: Shows the list of added mods.

remove.desc: Removes a mod from your mod list by its index.

export.desc:
Exports your mod-pack to a file that represents your mod-pack.
This file can be shared to anyone you want.
Note: The filename must end with a .txt

download.desc:
Download all the mods from the mod file and stores it in the folder specified.
Note: You should have a stable internet connection or this might fail.

state.desc: Displays the state of your settings. Information displayed includes mod_loader and game_version.

reset.desc: Resets the program to its defaults.

load.desc: Loads the contents of a mod-pack file into the current session.

depchk.desc: Checks and adds the dependency of all the mods in the current mod list.
